We believe the enduring power of stories can open our eyes to the world, to each other, and to new and different perspectives.
Delivering first-in-class content in the best and most engaging ways possible while equipping our people to do so requires an incredible amount of talentâ€¦ and technology. The technology and operations group covers things like the companyâ€™s data strategy, content delivery systems, master control operations, broadcast engineering, advertising technology, and the technology platform for HBO Max, while also supporting the everyday underpinnings of our company. Join our community of extraordinary team members who are truly building the tools that will run the future of entertainment.
Join us. Shape your story here.
The Job



WarnerMedia is looking for a hands-on Technical Leader with the knowledge, motivation, and energy to accelerate the efficiency of our engineering operations and implement scalable infrastructure on AWS. The successful candidate must demonstrate a successful track record in bringing high-quality solutions quickly to market, enjoy learning and applying new technologies, and thrive in a dynamic engineering-oriented work environment. The position is based out of NYC, ATL, or LA.



The Daily

Design and implement architecturally sound solutions on AWS
Work on architecture initiatives such as hybrid cloud strategy, container orchestration, and application lifecycle management
Drive adoption of technologies and processes that enable agile delivery of secure, maintainable, and scalable cloud solutions
Develop and support automation patterns and processes that enable teams to deploy and maintain applications on AWS
Document and promote architecture guidelines and recommendations for both business and technical audiences
Mentor technical team members to enhance their skill-set


The Essentials


6+ years of established track record in architecting and implementing scalable, distributed, and highly available systems on cloud and on-prem environments
Expert knowledge in various AWS technologies such as VPC, subnets, Security Groups, EC2, S3, IAM, Route 53, Lambda, ECS, Fargate, SAM, SQS, SNS, WAF, API Gateway, Cognito. (AWS Solution Architect certification is desirable.)
Hands-on experience in Terraform, Docker, MongoDB, ELK, Git, and Jenkins
Hands-on experience in programming languages such as Java, JavaScript, Python and databases such as MongoDB
Hands-on experience in designing and implementing RESTful APIs, event-driven workflows, and microservices architectures
Familiarity with domain-driven design and design patterns
Hands-on experience with Linux/Unix
Background in network and security architectures
Strong communication skills and an ability to interact with all levels of technical and non-technical personnel
Drive to master emerging technologies and share experiences with team members
Proven problem solving and critical thinking skills
Bachelorâ€™s degree in computer science, engineering, or equivalent technical experience
The Perks
Exclusive WarnerMedia events and advance screenings
Paid time off every year to volunteer for eligible employees
Access to well-being tools, resources, and freebies
Access to in-house learning and development resources
Part of the WarnerMedia family of powerhouse brands
